text: Do you have any advice for the date? I’d really like to nail it this time.
What do you mean just be myself? Surely not, It’s all about the other person, isn’t it, accommodating their needs.
I really hope the date goes well this time. I am determined to make it work. whatever this guy wants, I’m ready!
Come to think of it, this guy mentioned he likes really hairy guys. Is there anything you could add to make me even more hairy?
